sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Euchodia. Or, A prayer-song; being sacred poems on the history of the birth and passion of our blessed Saviour, and several other choice texts of Scripture. In two parts. / By Daniel Cudmore, Gent. Cudmore, Daniel, 17th cent.
[10], 120 p.
Printed by J.C. for William Ley in Paul's Chain., London, : 1655.
First word of title in Greek characters. With an additional title page, engraved. In verse. Annotation on Thomason copies: E.1606[2]: "8ber [i.e. October] 22"; E.1498[2]: "March. 9. 1654"; the 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out. Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
=======
Euchodia. Or, A prayer-song; being sacred poems on the history of the birth and passion of our blessed Saviour, and several other choice texts of Scripture. In two parts. / By Daniel Cudmore, Gent. Cudmore, Daniel, 17th cent.
[10], 120 p.
Printed by J.C. for William Ley in Paul's Chain., London, : 1655.
First word of title in Greek characters. With an additional title page, engraved. In verse. Annotation on Thomason copies: E.1606[2]: "8ber [i.e. October] 22"; E.1498[2]: "March. 9. 1654"; the 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out. Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
William Ley
J.C.
Paul's Chain.
>>>>>>> imprintparse
